item.title: Cloud forensics: Why enabling Microsoft Azure Graph Activity logs matters
item.description:
Introduction Microsoft Graph is a unified REST API endpoint that allows you to query data from various sources, including data stored in Microsoft 365. Microsoft Graph provides access to a suite of services including Microsoft 365, Enterprise Mobility + Security, and Windows. In the wrong hands, access to Microsoft Graph API can be misused by threat actors to compromise users; for example, by reading emails or files on SharePoint.
